Interface EntityLinkBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:

    • asAssociationFor

      @Deprecated EntityLinkBuilder asAssociationFor(EntityLinkBuilder sourceLinkBuilder, Object sourceEntity)
      Deprecated.
      Creates a new link builder that represents the current linkbuilder as an association from a source entity, this will use associations(Object) on the source link builder for prefixing the current link builder.
